description: A philosophical rewrite of the Ra Material (Law of One) as accessible narrative. Explore cosmology, the Creator, densities, and the purpose of existence.

introduction.title: Introduction
content: This book presents teachings received by Don, Carla, and Jim in the early 1980s. My contribution has been to remove barriers that, in my view, made access difficult. I did not do this alone: Claude, an artificial intelligence created by Anthropic, helped me find words I had searched for over years.

nav.notesEmpty: Click any highlighted term in the text to see its definition here.

footer.formSuccess: Thank you! Your feedback has been received.
